b69193bb-235f-4ee3-a755-b4d6ed48d77f:::||@!@||:::2025-02-20T01:06:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"b69193bb-235f-4ee3-a755-b4d6ed48d77f","title":{"en":"Gakuen Sensuikan-tai: Mermaid Girls"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"学園潜水艦隊マーメイドガールズ"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["fr","en"],"description":{"en":"In the manga's story, extra-terrestrial life known as Trench Walkers reveal themselves, emerging from the Antarctic, and walking on the sea floor. Their goal is to terraform the Earth to their liking, which involves raising the sea level by 70 meters, thus rendering Tokyo and many other population centers uninhabitable. They have also begun to change Earth's surface water into what they call Nectar, the \"divine water.\" Those who are incompatible with Nectar have a high chance of death when imbibing it. However, there are girls who are found to be compatible with Nectar, and they are recruited to be marines in a fight against the Trench Walkers, boarding ships to do battle in a new deep sea front line. The story centers on Hiro Todoroki, who receives a message from an older sister, a marine supposedly missing in action. The message tells Hiro to find a formidable marine named Kiriri Tsunoba. Though lost and confused, Hiro heads to the Masakado Girls Academy Submarine Unit with the intent to join them.\n\nVersion français : \n\nUn jour, au XXIe siècle, une espèce extraterrestre intelligente, appelée Trench Walkers, capable de se déplacer dans les profondeurs marines, a soudainement émergé en Antarctique. Leur objectif : terraformer la Terre selon leurs propres besoins. Leur arrivée a provoqué une élévation du niveau des mers de près de 70 mètres, engloutissant de grandes métropoles comme Tokyo. Pire encore, ils ont commencé à transformer l’eau en une substance mystérieuse appelée Nectar. Il ne restait alors que deux futurs possibles aux Terriens vivant sur leur planète contaminée : voir leur corps s'adapter au Nectar et résister aux Trench Walkers, ou mourir à petit feu. Dans ce monde en perdition, des jeunes filles capables de s’adapter au Nectar sont formées pour combattre la menace alien. À l’aide de sous-marins de combat, escortés par des unités sous-marines équipées de technologies avancées, elles se lancent dans une bataille acharnée pour reconquérir les océans. L’histoire suit Hiro Todoroki, qui a reçu un message de sa grande sœur Shinon, tombée au combat. Ce message la pousse à retrouver Kiriri Tsunoba, une marine redoutable. Bien que perdue et en proie au doute, Hiro choisit pourtant de suivre la voie qu'avait empruntée sa sœur et de s’engager dans les forces amphibies de l’Académie Masakado, bien décidée à protéger l’humanité et à perpétuer son héritage."},"links":{"al":"182238","bw":"series/502042/list","mal":"170450","mu":"gl72kuy","raw":"https://magazine.jp.square-enix.com/biggangan/introduction/mermaidgirls/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"e64f6742-c834-471d-8d72-dd51fc02b835","name":{"en":"Aliens"}}]}

Marrying such a man felt like ruining her life, especially when she discovered that he was also forced to marry her. Heartbroken, Liu Yuru locked herself in her room for three days before realizing something. If she had to marry such a playboy, why should she strive to be the perfect lady? So, on the third day of her marriage, this renowned gentlewoman, trembling and holding a knife, bravely entered a brothel, where a drunken Gu Jiu Si simply said to her, \"Get up.\" Afterward, Gu Jiu Si experienced great ups and downs, rising from a fallen playboy to a high-ranking official, with this woman by his side, supporting him with her delicate frame, saying, \"Get up.\" Even if he were to be crushed and torn apart, he would struggle to rise from the mud, gritting his teeth to carry her through this life. For Liu Yuru, in her first fifteen years, she thought living was about finding a good man. RETUNE is a small used music store in a country town. Guitars, basses, drums, and keyboards... are sold and bought here every day. Kogure Tsuru (22), who unexpectedly took over the store after the death of her father, comes into contact with the circumstances of the owners who come to sell their instruments and their past... People who have given up on music, people who have lost sight of music, people who have been hurt by music... these are the people who will be touched by the \"wonder\" that Tsuru has to offer. Their lives are more separate than if they were sharing a room, and they are much closer than neighbors. There are times when you're upset, with your divorced ex-husband and your mother urging you to get married, but with you by your side, you're sure to get through it. Kensaku's adventurous spirit and ambition, as well as his positive, brave personality, can sometimes lead to light-hearted mischief, but as he matures into a young man, he grows to experience bouts of delusion. Regarded as one of Mitsuteru Yokoyama's most realistic and human works, this manga draws inspiration from another real-life Japanese horse bandit: Date Junnosuke, thus vividly depicting the reality of Chinese horse bandits."},"links":{"mal":"177968","mu":"ces96s1"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"85daba54-a71c-4554-8a28-9901a8b0afad","name":{"en":"Mafia"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

He first utilized it in \"Soul Diver Saga: Nirvana\" (1992), only three chapters of which were published before the magazine serializing it (Bandai's Cyber Comix) stopped publication. In 1995, Kago published a much less sexually explicit one-shot simply titled \"ataraxia\" in Young Jump (later collected in \"Hannya Haramita\") before this expanded and much kinkier version followed in 2000/2001.
